title: Aveeno Baby Continuous Protection Mineral Sunscreen Stick for Sensitive Skin with Broad Spectrum SPF 50 Protection for Face & Body, Naturally Sourced 100% Zinc Oxide, Travel Size, 0.47 oz
description: An effective baby mineral sunscreen stick for on-the-go sun protection for your little one. Aveeno Baby Continuous Protection Sensitive Skin Mineral Sunscreen Stick with Broad Spectrum SPF 50 contains skin-soothing oat and naturally-sourced 100% zinc oxide active ingredient. This gentle mineral sunscreen for babies can be used on both face and body to form a protective barrier on top of the skin that absorbs and scatters UVA and UVB rays for superior sun protection. From the pediatrician-recommended brand, this baby sunscreen stick is designed for baby's sensitive skin and glides on easily for mess-free application. Its gentle formula is as mild as water to skin and won't run into eyes or cause stinging. Designed to be both non-greasy and non-sticky, this SPF 50 baby sunscreen is paraben- and phthalate-free and is sweat- and water-resistant for 80 minutes to help prevent sunburn. It comes in a convenient TSA travel-friendly size that fits in small places and is easy to carry on-the-go.
